rtega_mnemonic:
俯俯RS俛頫bend down, lie prostrate
  • person 亻 bending down before the force of the officials of the government 府
humanum_full_description_en:
From " page ", " mega " sound. The original meaning is to bow your head. "Shuowen": "Bow down, bow your head." Such as "Han Shu. "Chen Sheng Xiang Ji Biography": "The King of Bai Yue bowed his head and tied his neck, and appointed his officials." "Selected Works. Cao Zijian "Seven Qi": "Overlooking the meteors, looking up at the eight corners." See " Overlooking ", " Fun ".

The word "Fu" is rarely used today because of coldness. The world knows this word mostly because of the calligraphers Zhao Mengfu.
humanum_short_description_en: From " page ", " mega " sound. The original meaning is to bow your head.
humanum_full_description:
從「頁」，「兆」聲。本義是低頭。《說文》：「頫，低頭也。」如《漢書．陳勝項籍傳》：「百粵之君頫首係頸，委命下吏。」《文選．曹子建〈七啟〉》：「頫眺流星，仰觀八隅。」參見「俯」、「俛」。

　　頫字由於冷癖，今已極少使用，世人認識此字，大都因為書法家中有趙孟頫的緣故。

HSK 5: 府,腐,辅,輔
HSK 6: 撫,抚,俯
俯俯RS 俛 頫 bend down, lie prostrate
  • person 亻 bending down before the force of the officials of the government 府
Freq: 6894

從「 頁 」，「 兆 」聲。本義是低頭。《說文》：「頫，低頭也。」如《漢書．陳勝項籍傳》：「百粵之君頫首係頸，委命下吏。」《文選．曹子建〈七啟〉》：「頫眺流星，仰觀八隅。」參見「 俯 」、「 俛 」。 頫字由於冷癖，今已極少使用，世人認識此字，大都因為書法家中有趙孟頫的緣故。
From " page", " mega" sound. The original meaning is to bow your head. "Shuowen": "Bow down, bow your head." Such as "Han Shu. "Chen Sheng Xiang Ji Biography": "The King of Bai Yue bowed his head and tied his neck, and appointed his officials." "Selected Works. Cao Zijian "Seven Qi": "Overlooking the meteors, looking up at the eight corners." See " Overlooking", " Fun". The word "Fu" is rarely used today because of coldness. The world knows this word mostly because of the calligraphers Zhao Mengfu.

頫字的基本解释

頫
fǔ
同“俯”。

頫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǔ］
［《廣韻》方矩切，上麌，非。］
［《廣韻》他弔切，去嘯，透。］
“俯1”的古字。
[②]［tiào］
［《廣韻》他弔切，去嘯，透。］
眺。

頫字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頫； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1403第22
【唐韻】方矩切【集韻】匪父切，?音甫。【說文】低頭也。从頁逃省。太史卜書頫仰字如此。揚雄曰：人面頫。【徐鉉曰】頫首者，逃亡之貌，故从逃省。今俗作俯，非是。或作俛。　又【玉篇】靡卷切，音緬。義同。　又【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他弔切，音糶。【周禮·春官·典瑞】頫聘。【註】大夫衆來曰頫，寡來曰聘。又【秋官·大行人】殷頫以除邦國之慝。【註】殷頫，謂一服朝之歲也。一服朝之歲，五服諸侯，皆使卿以聘禮來頫天子。又【小行人】存、頫、省、聘、問，臣之禮也。【疏】存、頫、省三者，天子使臣，撫邦國之禮。聘、問二者，是諸侯使臣行聘。【左傳·昭五年】享頫有璋。【註】頫，見也。【釋文】頫，他弔反。又他彫反。　又【爾雅·釋詁】頫，視也。【註】謂察視也。【張衡·思?賦】流目頫乎衡阿兮，睹有黎之圯墳。　又【集韻】他刁切，音叨。盥也。　【韻會小補】古音流變，字亦隨異，如俯仰之俯，本作頫，或作俛，今皆作俯。而頫音兆，俛音免，不復音俯矣。

頫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　怀; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1403 and 22
[Tang Yun] Fang Juqie [Ji Yun] The bandit father cut,? Yinfu. [Said Wen] Bow your head. Escape from the page. This is the case with the pitching character in the Taishi Bushu. Yang Xiong said: People face down. [Xu Xuan said] Those who bow their heads have the appearance of fleeing, so they are from fleeing province. This is not true. Or as a feint.　[Jade Chapter] Extravagant roll cut, sound Burmese. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? He hangs and cuts, and the sound is 粜. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Dianrui】Advance employment. [Note] When the doctors come, they say down, and when the widows come, they say hire. Also【Qiuguan·Daxingren】Yin Fu eliminates the state of the country. [Note] Yin Fu is the age of the Yi Dynasty. At the age of one serving the court, and five serving the princes, all made the Qing bow down to the emperor with a betrothal gift. Also【Xiaoxingren】Save, obey, save, hire, ask, and courtesy of ministers. [Shu] Save, subdue, and save the three, the emperor's envoy, the ritual of the nation. Engaging and asking both are the appointments of princes and envoys. [Zuo Zhuan·The 5th Year of Zhao] Xiang Fu You Zhang. [Note] Overlooking, see also. [Explanation] Bowing, he hangs back. He turned it back again.　[Erya·Shi Xuan] Looking down, looking down. [Note] It is also called inspection. [Zhang Heng·Si? Fu] Liu's eyes looked down on Heng Axi, and Li Zhili's grave was seen.　[Jiyun] He is diligent and uttered. Wash also.　[Rhyme Hui Xiaobu] The ancient sounds change, and the characters also change, such as the pitching of the pitching, the original for the pitching, or the swindling, and the current for the pitching. And the overtone sign, the overtone is free, and the overtone is not polyphonic.

fǔ, wǎn, màn, tiǎo, tào
гл.
1) fǔ, wǎn, màn вм. 俯 (наклонить голову)
2) tiào ошибочно вм. 覜 (видеться, встречаться)
3) tiào прислушиваться, склонив голову
4) tào мыть руки
